first_para: Chris Philp (born 6 July 1976) is a British entrepreneur, a Conservative Party politician and the founder of the Next Big Thing. Chris is currently co-founder and Partner of Pluto Capital, a property development firm, which has offices in Serbia, Montenegro and London.

full.extract: Chris Philp (born 6 July 1976) is a British entrepreneur, a Conservative Party politician and the founder of the Next Big Thing. Chris is currently co-founder and Partner of Pluto Capital, a property development firm, which has offices in Serbia, Montenegro and London.
full.title: Chris Philp
